item.description:
Journeying is a meditative technique known to all shamanic cultures. A shaman journeys to meet his or her own helping spirits and to ask them for guidance, teachings, and healing. Journeying with others is always more powerful because of the supportive group energy. The more one makes a practice of journeying, the deeper the experience becomes. Join us in the practice of journeying together.

Beginners or experienced journeyers are welcome.

Mia Corinha is a Master NLP Practitioner, Hypnotist and Shamanic Practitioner with a lifelong love of learning and teaching empowering spiritual practices.

If you have not journeyed before, please come at 7:00pm so that Mia can explain more about the journeying and answer your questions. Also, bring your drums and rattles! We'll do some drumming as a group before settling into our journeys.

When: Wednesday, April 27, 7:30 - 9:00pm
Cost: $20 if paid online, $25 at the door

Limited to 12 people, register early!
item.how_to_find_us: Please check Directions page at www.eternal-balance.com if you have not been to the studio before.
item.why: It is fun and you never know where your journey will take you!
item.name: Shamanic Journeying Group
